turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Can you stop by Starbucks on Glenwood in Raleigh for?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What are you feeling like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Today I will have a Cherry Mocha. I've never tried it but my wife says they are the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I recently starting drinking the Cherry Mocha. They are excellent.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful news.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So what size do you want, and any other special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a Venti Cherry Mocha. I'll have a look at the menu online to see what the other options are.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, let me know when you're ready and I'll head over there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks. So a venti Cherry Mocha, with whole milk and whipped cream. That sounds good to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, I always get them the same way. You won't be disappointed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have an account there, so just charge it to my Starbucks account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me know if you have any trouble. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so just to confirm. It's a venti Cherry Mocha with whole milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, placing the order now. I'll let you know when it's ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's all ready to go. Your order will be ready for pickup shortly and they'll be sending the receipt to your phone!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thanks for being the best assistant ever! See you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. It's my pleasure. So long!
